泆字的基本解释

泆
yì
古同“逸”。
古通“溢”。

泆
dié
〔泆荡〕荡涤。

泆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》夷質切，入質，以。］
(1)放荡；放纵。
(2)通“溢”。水满而泛滥。
(3)舒缓安闲。参见“泆然”。

泆字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　泆； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页615第09
【唐韻】夷質切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】弋質切，?音逸。【說文】水所蕩泆也。與溢同。【書·禹貢】入于河，溢爲滎。　又淫放。【書·多士】大淫泆有辭。【左傳·隱三年】驕奢淫泆。【疏】泆，謂放恣無藝。　又泆陽，獸名，豹頭馬尾。一曰神名。【莊子·達生篇】西北方之下者，則泆陽處之。　又鳥名。【爾雅·釋鳥】?雉泆泆。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?徒結切，音姪。泆蕩也。

泆字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
泆字的起名意思

同"溢"。水满流出；放恣，放纵。

Basic explanation of words
Stupid
yì
Gu Tong "Yi".
Gutong "overflows".
Stupid
dié
〔Dangdang〕
Stupid
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guangyun" barbarians cut into the quality, to the quality. ]
(1) Debauchery; indulgence.
(2) Through "overflow". The water is full and overflowing.
(3) Soothes and relaxes. See "Lang Ran".
Stupid

[Si Ji 1] [Shui Character Department] 　泆; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 615 09
[Tang Yun] Yi Zhi Qiao [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Yi Qiao Qiao,? Yin Yi. [Said the text] The water is dangling. Same with overflow. [Book·Yugong] Entering the river, overflowing into Ying.　Lesson again. 【Book·Toast】Looking for nothing. [Zuo Zhuan·Hidden Three Years] Extravagant and prosperous. 【Sparse】Length, that is to say that there is no art to let go.　 Yang Yang, the name of the beast, the head of the leopard and the pony tail. One is the name of God. [Zhuangzi·Dasheng Chapter] Those below the northwest are located in Yangyang.　Also known as the bird name. [Erya·Shiniao]? The pheasant is stubborn.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Only knot cut, sound nymph. Stupid too.

Stupid
Name meaning
Same as "overflow". The water flows out in full; let go, indulge.
yì
I прил.
распущенный, несдержанный
骄奢淫泆 заносчив, расточителен, развратен и несдержан
II гл.
вм. 溢 (переливаться через край)
